Reconstruct {4}{B}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the converted mana cost of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]
Destroy all creatures. If The Afterlife Takes Its Due was reconstructed, create an X/X black Zombie Horror creature token, where X is the number of creature cards that have entered graveyards this turn.
